data.text: @Gprinziv @TheRealGilJaxon @PhilosophyTube She blasted psychologists, doctors & universal healthcare via the NHS. She doesn't discuss the lack of funding and political parties harming the NHS or the dire need more doctors. She acts like the US private healthcare system is better and says the NHS is evil. It's gross.

@JaxxsonMarcotte @bot77601004 @PhilosophyTube At no point did she point out how silly it was and instead continued to discuss HPV as if it was a virus that only effects women. Poor taste and misinformation.
@Serene_Lotus @krellend20 @CrimsonEsquire @PhilosophyTube Lol then demonstrate it or stfu and move on.
@stormrobinson @krellend20 @CrimsonEsquire @PhilosophyTube Those statements are verifiably and demonstrably false. Sit down.

@krellend20 @CrimsonEsquire @PhilosophyTube Masks don’t work.
Vaccines don’t work.
Lockdowns don’t work.

Do you, but fuck off and do it by yourself. Your heath isn’t my problem.

@stormrobinson @CrimsonEsquire @PhilosophyTube Because our fear of needles outweighs our desire for public health and safety brought about by a vaccine.

Wear a mask.
@PhilosophyTube Well this was a giant waste of time…
@krellend20 @CrimsonEsquire @PhilosophyTube Lol actually its because I’m healthy and I’m not taking medicine because you’re sick.
